title: Champion Mastery Privilege Bug
body: There's appears to be a bug on Bard's champion masteries. When leveled up to 5 I didn't have the privilege to use  my champion mastery emote.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/ppJJPjEe-champion-mastery-issues-with-loading-screen-badge-and-emote

Apparently the fix for it should have already shipped. If you're still getting it, post up on the aforementioned discussion.
